caption: A person wearing a beret was playing golf on the course. For the moment time seems to go a lot slower. He hit the ball and it rolled across the field and smoothly into the hole. Everyone cheered. A group of men sat on a luxurious room's sofa, smoking and chatting. A man and a woman were talking indoors. During the day, a man picked up his equipment and left home. Two older individuals found him and had a conversation. The man walked straight to a young boy. Several people were drawing lots inside a tent. A crowd had gathered outside.
